00047     template<typename T, Integer _lo=0, Integer _hi=-1> class List :
00048                 public std::vector<T>, public Aggregate
00049     {

00071         List(const T value[], Integer count) throw(std::range_error)
00072         {
00073             resize(count);
00074             for (Integer i=0; i<count; ++i)
00075                 (*this)[i]=value[i];

00081         List(const std::list<T>& value) throw(std::range_error)
00082         {
00083             resize(value.size());
00084             std::copy(value.begin(), value.end(), this->begin());

00092         virtual void resize(Integer newsize, const T& _val = getUnset(T())) throw(std::out_of_range)
00093         {
00094             setUnset(false);
00095             if (_hi>0)
00096                 if (newsize>_hi)
00097                     throw std::range_error("resizing size bigger than size of List");
00098             std::vector<T>::resize(newsize, _val);

00174         virtual void push_back(const T& _val) throw(std::out_of_range)
00175         {
00176             setUnset(false);

00189         virtual inline Integer getUpperBound()

00209         virtual inline void checkRange(Integer idx) const throw( std::out_of_range)
00210         {
00211             if (idx<0)
00212                 throw std::out_of_range("index is negative");
00213             if (_hi>0)
00214                 if (idx>=_hi)
00215                     throw std::out_of_range("index is over or equal to high index");
00216             if (idx>=Integer(std::vector<T>::size()))
00217                 throw std::out_of_range("index is over size of aggregate");
00218         }
00219     private:
00220         // cannot allow to have an operator that will allow different sizes of List to be assigned

00226     template<typename T, Integer _lo, Integer _hi> inline List<T,_lo,_hi> &getUnset(List<T,_lo,_hi>)
